bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.description: CPU only failing. CUDA seems unaffected. A number of 1d and 2d CNN tests are failing. Not just pooling related. comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
